title: Disgaea PC / 魔界戦記ディスガイア PC

notes: The Game just worked, the only weirdness is that if you move aroud using the mouse the character sometimes do a fast walk like teleporting, it's weird. Using a controller this weird bug don't show up. I also Tried on a laptop with Ubuntu 18.04 and Intel/AMD gpu, the game launches and plays well (with the mouse/walking bug), but once I close it, it will not load again. Manjaro + Nvidia works just fine (I didn't tried fullscreen, I prefer windowed)
title: Disgaea PC / 魔界戦記ディスガイア PC

gpu: NVIDIA Corporation GeForce GTX 1070 With Max-Q Design/PCIe/SSE2
notes:
Played with a controller and all settings run perfectly.

The only glitch is if you change the screen size, either by fullscreen or stretching the window. Doing so will cause the game to fail to launch the next time round. 

You can fix this crash by deleting the config file and launching the game again.
